changelog.release_notes:
Fifth release (Version 0.5)
* The service to fetch the USD2EUR rate was hostet on cloudControl, which went bankrupt. So we migrated to heroku.

Fourth release (Version 0.4)

* Toggle USD/EUR on up/down button
* Refresh on select
* Minor layout improvements
* Remove light flashing (sucked)

Third release (Version 0.3)

* Major layout improvements
* Dynamical rate: The USD/EUR is not fetched from ECB website (http://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/eurofxref/eurofxref-daily.xml)
* Light flash on shake/refresh

Second release (Version 0.2)

Displays "Fetching ..." as body while fetching.

First release (Version 0.1)

Displays current bitcoin rate in USD and in EUR (with fix exchange rate 1 EUR = 1.1213 USD)

description:
This watchapp displays the current USD and EUR rate for 1 BTC from the Blockchain Charts & Statistics API.

Features:
* Displays current USD and EUR rate for 1 BTC
* Toggle USD/EUR via up/down buttons
* Shake watch or press select (center button) to refresh

If you find any errors or have any ideas how to improve this app, don't hesitate to contact us.

########################################
TRANSLATIONS (google translated)
----------------------------------------

FRANçAIS

Cette watchapp affiche le taux de USD et EUR 1 BTC actuel des graphiques et statistiques Blockchain API.

DEUTSCH

Diese watchapp zeigt die aktuelle USD und EUR Preis für 1 BTC von den Blockchain Charts & Statistics-API.

ESPAñOL

Este watchapp muestra el USD y EUR tasa actual de 1 BTC de las Gráficas Blockchain y Estadísticas API.

RUSSIAN/Русский

Это watchapp отображает текущую скорость долларах США и евро на 1 BTC от Blockchain Графики & статистике API.

CHINESE/中文

这watchapp显示当前美元和欧元汇率为1 BTC从Blockchain图表和统计数据的API。

########################################
LATEST CHANGELOG
----------------------------------------

v0.5
* The service to fetch the USD2EUR rate was hostet on cloudControl, which went bankrupt. So we migrated to heroku.

v0.4
* Toggle USD/EUR on up/down button
* Refresh also on select
* Minor layout improvements
* Remove light flashing (sucked)

v0.3
* Major layout improvements
* USD/EUR rate is now fetched from ECB (was static rate before)
